name: jsx-alone
description: Write JSX without React or any other library

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run test-build-js && npm run sc-tsc
scripts.test-run-js: npm run test-build-js && npx tsc && node dist/spec
scripts.sca-module-unit-test-build: cd sca-module-unit-test && npm i && npm run build
scripts.sca-module-unit-test: npm run sca-module-unit-test-build && cd sca-module-unit-test && npm i && sh build.sh && sca-unit-test --puppeteerNodeModulesPath /home/sg/git/WASM-ImageMagick/ --path ~/awa/kilimanjaro/ --modules SCTypesFrontEndCoreTests
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test-run && npm run test-run-js && npm run test-sca-module-unit-test
scripts.clean-npm: npm run clean && find . -name "node_modules" -exec rm -rf '{}' + ; find . -name "package-lock.json" -exec rm -rf '{}' +;
scripts.all: npm run clean-npm && npm i && npm run build && npm test

author: Sebastian Gurin
